---
title: "Billboard-Analysis"
output: html_document
date: '2022-06-24'
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(billboard)
```

```{r}
x <- wiki_hot_100s |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  mutate(year=as.numeric(year))
```


```{r}
x |> 
  group_by(year) |> 
  distinct(artist) |> 
  summarize(dis_artist=n())
```
